Staff.Title: Mr
Staff.Note: Director and Secretary General, Eurodefense UK Ltd (a company limited by guarantee); Director and Director-General, UK Defence Forum Ltd (a company limited by guarantee); Director and Chairman, Great North Properties Ltd; Chairman and Director, Bergmans Research Ltd (also shareholder); Director, Armstrong Whitworth Ltd (unpaid); Director, Eldon Square Company Limited (unremunerated nominee on behalf of Newcastle City Council); Member of advisory committee, Perseus Global Ltd (unpaid at present); UK Defence Forum (am technically an employee of this organisation); Elected Councillor, Newcastle City Council; from time to time I receive hospitality from All Party Parliamentary Group for the Armed Forces which over the course of a calendar year exceeds the registration threshold; from time to time I receive hospitality from All Party Parliamentary Group on Defence and Security Issues which over the course of a calendar year exceeds the registration threshold; Director, Armstrong Centre Company Limited (100% owned by Newcastle City Council, which has appointed me in my role as a councillor as a director on its behalf. As a director I will be automatically appointed to be a director of Tynexe Limited and its two subsidiary companies, Tynexe Residential Limited and Tynexe Commercial Limited. The Armstrong Centre Company holds 50% of the shares in Tynexe Limited, with Dysart Developments (North East) Limited being the other shareholder)
